# SNP analysis



## Diversification and independent domestication of Asian and European pears

### Data source

1. Sample information

The sample information is provided as [supplemental files](https://goo.gl/o3vMVU) in the paper (\@PearWu2018). 

2. Raw data 

Raw data is deposited in NCBI database under the accession number: [SRP103970](https://trace.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Traces/sra/?study=SRP103970)
